= Misc Tags =
||###</category>||The number that ends the Category string for powers is the level of the power||

||ID_INTERNAL_CATEGORY_ATTACK||Denotes an attack power||
||ID_INTERNAL_CATEGORY_UTILITY||Denotes a utility power||
||ID_INTERNAL_CATEGORY_ENCOUNTER||Denotes an encounter power||
||ID_INTERNAL_CATEGORY_ENCOUNTER_USAGE||Denotes an encounter power (x2?)||
||ID_INTERNAL_CATEGORY_DAILY||Denotes a daily power||
||ID_INTERNAL_CATEGORY_DAILY_USAGE||Denotes a daily power (x2?)||

= Action Types =
||ID_INTERNAL_CATEGORY_STANDARD_ACTION||Denotes a power that requires a standard action||
||ID_INTERNAL_CATEGORY_OPPORTUNITY_ACTION||Denotes a power that requires an opportunity action||
||ID_INTERNAL_CATEGORY_MINOR_ACTION||
||ID_INTERNAL_CATEGORY_IMMEDIATE_REACTION||
||ID_INTERNAL_CATEGORY_IMMEDIATE_INTERRUPT||

= Alternate Lines =
||ID_INTERNAL_CATEGORY_MISS||Denotes a power with a miss effect||
